# Free responses

```{r}
selectInput(
  inputId = "question_name", 
  label = h3("Free response question"), 
  choices = free_response_question_names, 
  selected = 1)

  questionnaire[, c("subj_id", input$question_name)] %>%
    drop_na()
})

selected_question <- reactive({
  get_question_text(input$question_name)
})
```
